basics.name: John Derocher
basics.label: I'm a detail oriented relationship builder with a wide range of experience and a passion for improvement.

work.desc: Manage the day to day service operations.   Recruiting of service technicians and service department staff.  Overseeing three departments; Customer Service, Parts, and Special Operations.  Our main focus is service preventative maintenance and our special operations function which includes; load banking, fuel polishing, major overhauls, installations, and rentals.

work.summary: International Service and Field Service Manager
work.desc: Manage International customer service group, and electronic parts order entry.  Provide training and support for internal customer service technicians.  Manage Field Service Training globally.

work.company: Florida Steel Drum Co. Inc., Harrisburg, NC
work.desc: Manufacturing the tops and bottoms of 55 gallon steel drums for two plants.
Injection molding rubber process, manufacturing high voltage transmission and distribution insulators.  Managed 22 employees in material prep and production for 7 presses.
Created and managed the service department, repairing all types of fitness equipment commercial and residential.

education.studyType: Associate's Degree, Business Administration and Management, General
